Activity: Log in to the system and check emails for any urgent requests or updates. I'll grab a cup of coffee to get my day started.
Review the EHR data elements list provided by @DA-1 and @HIS-1 last week. Refresh my understanding of each element and their potential impact on data abstraction.
Begin refining the data abstraction protocol draft based on the EHR data elements. Focus on clarity and conciseness to minimize ambiguity during data entry. I will think step by step.

Start working on the standardized form design. Focus on user-friendliness and intuitive layout. Think about the logical flow of data entry for abstractors. Maybe look at some design websites for inspiration.
Lunch break. Head to the cafeteria to grab lunch and socialize with colleagues.
Continue working on the standardized form. Try to create the form on the computer using software. It's more efficient and effective.

Email @DA-1 and @HIS-1 to schedule a brief meeting tomorrow morning to review the initial data abstraction protocol and standardized form drafts. @DA-1 @HIS-1 Topic: Review of Initial Data Abstraction Protocol and Standardized Form Drafts
Continue drafting the protocol and form, incorporating any potential improvements based on initial considerations.
Review the day's progress and make a list of items to address tomorrow before the meeting with @DA-1 and @HIS-1.
Prepare for the end of the day. I like to listen to music to relax.
